CHAT.comment: VIRGINIA OFFICE FOR PROTECTION AND ADVOCACY, Petitioner v. JAMES W. STEWART, III, COMMISSIONER, VIRGINIA DEPARTMENT OF BEHAVIORAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL SERVICES, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:01 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SETH M. GALANTER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GINGER D. ANDERS ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EARLE DUNCAN GETCHELL, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SETH M. GALANTER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:01 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
